simulated_ratings.title: Uncle Boonmee Who Can Recall His Past Lives (Loong Boonmee raleuk chat) (2010)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Lyrical and haunting, but its meditative drift kept me at arm's length.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Sincere, tuneful, and surprisingly moving.

simulated_ratings.title: Connections (1978)

simulated_ratings.title: Out of Towners, The (1970)
